channel.title: My Favorite Podcasts on Random Bits of Wisdom
channel.description: Recent content in My Favorite Podcasts on Random Bits of Wisdom

item.title: Rabbit Hole
item.description: “Rabbit Hole” is a podcast series about the adverse effects of online media.
item.content:
“Rabbit Hole” is a podcast series about the adverse effects of online media and technology. Those are hard to notice at first. Yet, algorithms dictate much of what we watch, listen or read about nowadays. Algorithms, designed with a single goal in mind- to maximize engagement. Algorithms, which, whether intentionally or unintentionally, create echo chambers around hot topics, evoking deeply hidden desires and radical thoughts.

I can totally recommend this podcast. I will just say, though. Always take everything you’re presented, with a grain of salt. Including “Rabbit Hole”, or my blog for that matter.

Rabbit Hole
What is the internet doing to us? The Times tech columnist Kevin Roose discovers what happens when our lives move online.
https://art19.com |
Created with Linqable

item.title: Talk Python to Me
item.description: Talk Python To Me is a podcast for developers who are passionate about Python. Learn about the language and related technologies.
item.content:
“Talk Python to Me” is a must-listen for the every programmer. Regardless of whether you have something to do with Python or not, each episode is so interesting that you’d wished you did. I was still in Enterprise Java world, when I started listen to TPTM. It opened up a parallel universe worth exploring. Especially, when it comes to data science, machine learning, and other data-related topics. Host Michael Kennedy is a well-versed person, always asking the right questions, which makes each interview that more engaging.

An absolute must-listen!

Talk Python To Me Podcast
Talk Python To Me is a podcast for developers who are passionate about Python. Learn about the language and related technologies.
https://talkpython.fm |
